channel.title: Canids on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Canids on ZooBerry

item.title: Coyote II
item.description: A Cute playful Coyote From the Deserts of North-America, they like to chase their tale, grooming themselves and drinking water. A great option for your zoos ES Required.

item.title: Dingo II
item.description: An Australian scrub animal with slight color variations.

item.title: Eevee
item.description: Adorable Eevee for your zoo.

item.title: Pampas Fox
item.description: A South American fox species for your zoo.

item.title: Red Fox III
item.description: A playful red fox with three variations.

item.title: Silver Eevee
item.description: Another Eevee variant for your zoo.

item.title: Umbreon and Blue Umbreon
item.description: A pair of interbreeding Pokemon species.

item.title: Alaskan Timber Wolf
item.description: Alaskan Timber Wolf with four skins and realistic behavior coding.

item.title: Arctic Wolf
item.description: An Arctic tundra wolf with color variations.

item.title: Bat-Eared Fox II
item.description: A savannah carnivore.

item.title: Black-Backed Jackal II
item.description: A beautifully striped African canid.

item.title: German Shepherd
item.description: A domestic canine for zoo exhibits.

item.title: Mightyena
item.description: A fictional animal based on a Pok√©mon character.

item.title: Great Plains Wolf
item.description: The Great Plains Wolf with three color variations, as requested by Soop.

item.title: Eurasian Wolf
item.description: The Eurasian Wolf features two variants, with the lighter one as the default.

item.title: Fenris Wolf II
item.description: This dark, mythical wolf will frighten and amaze your guests, perfect for Halloween zoos.

item.title: Spotted Hyena II
item.description: The Spotted Hyena requires the Endangered Species and African Adventure expansions to use.

item.title: Coyote
item.description: A smaller relative of the wolf, the adaptable coyote thrives in all biomes.

item.title: Iberian Wolf
item.description: The Iberian wolf (Canis lupus signatus) is a critically endangered wolf native to Portugal and Spain.

item.title: Boreal Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Black-Backed Jackal
item.description: These animals are omnivorous and will eat carrion, as well as plants such as grass, fruit, berries and seed.

item.title: Dhole II
item.description: The dhole is a species of canid native to Southeast Asia. It is the only extant member of the genus Cuon.

item.title: Dingo
item.description: The dingo is an Australian wild dog living in various habitats, ranging from tropical coastal beaches, inland deserts or alpine forest.

item.title: Maned Wolf
item.description: A South American savannah-dwelling canid with one variant skin.

item.title: South America Pack
item.description: From the high Andes Mountains to the lush tropical Amazon Forest lives an amazing array of wildlife. Welcome to South America!

item.title: Eurasian Wolf Mini Pack
item.description: The Eurasian wolf, also known as the European, common or forest wolf, is a subspecies of grey wolf which has the largest range among wolf subspecies.

item.title: Arctic Fox
item.description: Arctic foxes are pure white in winter and grey-brown in summer. They can also be light brown, grey, chocolate, or black with a bluish hue.

item.title: Bat Eared Fox
item.description: These foxes live in the scrub, savannah and grasslands of Africa.

item.title: Red Fox II
item.description: Red foxes are native to the Nearctic, Palearctic, Oriental, and Ethiopian regions, and have been introduced to areas in the Australian region.

item.title: Red Fox
item.description: The most widespread carnivore in the world is ready for your zoos!

item.title: Domesticated Silver Fox (Siberian Fox)
item.description: A domesticated form of the silver morph of the red fox.

item.title: Red Wolf
item.description: A wolf made by Radar and koala komander.

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: Mediterranean Pack
item.description: The Mediterranean Pack contains Four animals and Four Plant from the Mediterranean Region, both Aquatic and Terrestrial.

item.title: Dhole
item.description: Resized bigger than the wolf

item.title: Fantasy Wolf
item.description: These boreal forest wolves enjoy eating a variety of foods including bananas, berries, insects, fish, and meat.

item.title: Italian Wolf
item.description: A subspecies of wolf from the Apennine Mountains in Italy.

item.title: Mexican Wolf
item.description: The Mexican Wolf is a sub-species of the Gray Wolf.
